Text: RE concrete stainHi We recently faced the same questions concerning our cement floor finishing heres what we found Oringinal Plan was for stamped and pigmented color added at the cement plant with stained accents and highlighting to simulate a sautillo tile Our project is rather large sq ft SB house with sq ft porch surrounding it Lots of cement approx sq yds After looking at the costs we changed our minds rather quickly Labor for Stamping Crew Davis Color Stain lbs per yd x yds x lb These are above and beyond the cost of the concrete Actual Result Took a truck and trailer to Mexico and handpicked Sautillo tiles for inside the house Changed the color of the cement on the porch to lb per yd mix color added the overrun tiles we had left over as stringers in the porch and accented with acid etched stain Tiles and Transportation Labor mastic and beer tile setting did it myself Acid Stain for porch Davis Pigment x yds I can get you the info on the stain if you like I ordered it from a company the web cant remember off hand who I ordered a sample kit for which has colors you can mix and match for the results you want It was easy to work with much like painting in water colors on a large scale Hope this helps you out Matt Kizziah
